content.question: If a nationâ€™s actual real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is less than potential real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The actual rate of unemployment exceeds the natural rate of unemployment.

content.answer: The actual rate of unemployment exceeds the natural rate of unemployment.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
